VIDEO (ni za občutljive): Grozljivo dejanje nogometaša, nekateri zanj zahtevajo zapor
Ob živce so ga spravili piščanci.
06 Nov 2019, 19:20 by T. V.
GORNJA JELENSKA – Pred dobrim letom so se hrvaški nogometaši znašli na naslovnicah vseh mogočih medijev, ko so postali svetovni podprvaki, tokrat pa je eden od njih dobil publiciteto zaradi drugačnih razlogov.Ivan Gazdek (23) je na tekmi druge županijske nogometne lige med domačim Jelengradom in Jasenovcem prejel rdeči karton, ker je po igrišču podil piščance, ki so zašli tja. Enega od njih je z brco usmrtil, nato pa vrgel z igrišča. Gazdeka je sodnik zaradi tega nemudoma izključil.»Verjemite mi, ni bilo namenoma. Tekma še ni bila odločena, bil sem nervozen. Piščanci so nenehno prihajali na igrišče, zato bi morali tekmo ustaviti. Zelenica je bila polna drekcev, to je nehigienično. Tekel sem za piščanci, da bi jih pregnal, zamahnil sem z nogo in enega ubil,« je dejal Gazdek za 24sata. Po tekmi je lastnici piščancev napisal opravičilo in ji kupil novega piščanca. Kljub opravičilu so v društvu za zaščito živali proti nogometašu vložili kazensko prijavo. Pravijo, da je nedolžna žival umrla v mukah in da jo je nogometaš namenoma ubil. »Na zelenico bi lahko pritekel majhen otrok. Bi stekel tudi za njim in ga zbrcal?«

VIDEO (Not for the Sensitive): A horrific act by a football player, some require jail time
Chicks got him on his nerves.
06 Nov 2019, 19:20 by T.V.
GORNJA JELENSKA - A good year ago, Croatian footballers found themselves on the front pages of all possible media when they became world champions, but this time one of them received publicity for different reasons.Ivan Gazdek (23) won another county football league match between his home country of Jelengrad and received a red card for the Jasenians because he handed out chickens who went there after playing. He killed one of them with a kick and then threw him off the field. Gazdeka immediately ruled out the judge. "Believe me, it was not intentional. The match was not decided yet, I was nervous. The chickens kept coming to the field, so we had to stop the game. The greens were full of shit, that's unhygienic. I ran after the chickens to chase them, I swung my leg and killed one, "Gazdek told 24 Hours. After the game, he wrote an apology to the chicken owner and bought her a new chicken. Despite the apology, they filed a criminal complaint with the Animal Welfare Society. They say an innocent animal died in agony and was killed intentionally by a football player. “A young child could come to the green. Would you run after him and throw him away? "
